sentences.en: Bile salts are unusually effective at rupturing cell walls.
sentences.cn: 胆汁酸盐对于破坏细胞壁通常很有效.

sentences.en: Causes and treatment of bile leakage ( a report of 22 cases ).
sentences.cn: 胆漏的原因及防治 ( 附22例报告 )

sentences.en: Cholecystectomy bile duct stone remnants of the re - operation is safe and effective.
sentences.cn: 胆囊切除术后胆道残余结石的再手术是安全有效的.

sentences.en: Drainage is certainly indicated because of the probability of bile leakage.
sentences.cn: 由于有胆漏的可能性,引流肯定是需要的.

sentences.en: Gallstones are formed from the constituents of bile.
sentences.cn: 胆石症是由胆汁的成分形成的.

sentences.en: He aims his bile at religion, drugs, and politics.
sentences.cn: 他把怒气发泄在宗教、毒品和政治问题上。

sentences.en: It has been impossible to anticipate the amount of bile drainage.
sentences.cn: 预计胆汁的引流量是不可能的.

sentences.en: Mechanical obstruction may require operation for repair of common bile duct stricture or for gallstones.
sentences.cn: 机械性梗阻可能需要手术以修复胆总管狭窄或除去胆石.

sentences.en: Obstruction of the bile duct is associated with cholangitis.
sentences.cn: 胆管梗阻能并发胆管炎.

sentences.en: The Ascaris adults may perforate a suture line or cause a bile or pancreatic duct obstruction.
sentences.cn: 成虫可穿破缝线或引起胆管或胰腺管阻塞.

sentences.en: The bile acids are found cytotoxicity to cardiac muscle cells in experiments.
sentences.cn: 胆汁酸对实验动物心肌细胞具有毒性作用.

sentences.en: The critic's review of the play was just a paragraph of bile.
sentences.cn: 那位批评家对这部戏剧的评论不过是在发泄怒气。

sentences.en: The entire extrahepatic bile duct can not be visualized in all cases.
sentences.cn: 结果:所有的患儿均未见到完整的肝外胆道.

sentences.en: the secretion of bile by the liver
Then one February afternoon, alone in her bedroom, she reached for the textbook and her heart banged and her mouth filled with peanut butter-flavored bile.
sentences.cn: 接着在二月里一个下午，她单独呆在卧室里，够到那本教科书，她的心蹦蹦跳起来，嘴里冲满花生奶油味道的胆汁。

sentences.en: They are mixed with animal glue and ox bile to make the lustre stay.
sentences.cn: 画师把它们跟动物胶和牛胆汁混合，以使颜色的光泽长存。

sentences.en: Yes, I said to myself, I too love everything that flows: rivers, sewers, lava, semen, blood, bile, words, sentences.
sentences.cn: 是啊，我对自己说，我也爱流动的一切：河流、阴沟、熔岩、精液、血、胆汁、词和句子。

sentences.en: You invite us to eat fish and then feed us with your bile.
sentences.cn: 你邀请我们来吃鱼,却向我们发泄你的愤怒.

words.tran_cn: 胆的；胆汁的；输送胆汁的；由于胆汁异状的

trans.tran_en: a bitter green-brown liquid formed in the  liver  , which helps you to  digest  fats
